newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-S&P rates Advance Bank EMTN issue.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-S&P rates Advance Bank EMTN issue.

text.p: Standard and Poor's Corp said on Wednesday it assigned an A long term rating and an A1 short term rating to the senior debt of Advance Bank Australia Ltd's US$700 million Euro medium term note programme.
S&P said it assigned A long term and A2 short term ratings to the subordinated debt of the EMTN programme.
"At the same time, Standard and Poor's affirms its A long term and A1 short-term credit ratings of Advance," it said.

"The credit ratings reflect Advance's sound financial profile, as well as its improved competitive position, risk diversification, and financial flexibility with the recent acquisition of the Bank of South Australia Ltd (BankSA)."
S&P said the ratings outlook of Advance, a Sydney-based regional bank with most of its business directed at the mortgage market, was stable. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
